title: Ep 456 | Jase's Parenting Dangers & Phil Decodes Pink Floyd
description:
Jase has been spending a lot of time with his brother Jep, who introduced him to his new favorite song. Jase compares life to a wilderness, with all of its stresses. Phil loves the guitar picking of Pink Floyd, but disagrees with some of the lyrics. And Jase recalls the unexpected perils of raising children, balancing work and life, and finding time to sleep between cleaning up messes.

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://blazetv.com/unashamed
